name: General Entertainment Quiz | Entertainment Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many actors have played James Bond 007 in films up to (and including) 'GoldenEye'?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	The six actors were Sean Connery, David Niven, George Lazenby, Roger Moore, Timothy Dalton, and Pierce Brosnan.

questions.text: How many times has Danny Glover and Mel Gibson appeared together in the same film, up to and including, 'Lethal Weapon 4'?
questions.explanation:
5.

	There were the 'Lethal Weapon' series 1-4 and 'Maverick'. Danny Glover plays a bank robber as Mel Gibson's character tries to get his money from the bank.

questions.text: Who is the animated figurehead of Sega?
questions.explanation:
Sonic the Hedgehog.

	'Sonic the Hedgehog' was designed in a competition among the employees to fight Nintendo's 'Mario'.

questions.text: In what film will you find Patrick Swayze, C. Thomas Howell, Lea Thompson, Jennifer Grey, and Charlie Sheen?
questions.explanation:
'Red Dawn'.

	It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

questions.text: What is the 'Pink Panther' in the film of the same name?
questions.explanation:
A diamond.

	The 'Pink Panther' was a flawed diamond in the film.

questions.text: In 'Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure', who was the first historical figure that they met?
questions.explanation:
Napoleon.

	Napoleon was the first to be taken from his time zone. Even though it was an accident, they then decided to take a few more people for their history project.

questions.text: What year was Marty McFly taken back to in 'Back to the Future'?
If you rolled a 4 on your first throw at the beginning of a game of Monopoly. What would you have landed on?
questions.explanation:
Income Tax.

	No matter what country the game is played in, there is always Income Tax on the fourth square. Just like 'Just Visiting', 'Free Parking', and 'Go to Jail' are in the corners.

questions.text: How many points is the Queen of Spades worth in the game of 'Hearts'?
questions.explanation:
13.

	There are several short games that can be played in Hearts. They are 'One hand Queen Forfeits', 'One hand Moon forfeits', and 'One hand Passer Forfeits'.

questions.text: What was Daniel's first lesson in Karate in 'The Karate Kid'?
questions.explanation:
Wax On, Wax Off.

	Daniel's first lesson was to clean all the cars in the front yard. Only later did he realize he had learned some Karate blocks.
